DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sub-division of the biospecimen collection and storage information for requirements.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

Concepts.definition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information.

Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
